summary: Experienced and versatile web developer with proficiency in programming languages such as Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, WordPress, and JavaScript, as well as operating systems including Linux (Kali Linux and Ubuntu), Windows, and Mac OS. Skilled in creating custom websites using CMS platforms, troubleshooting and maintaining servers, network architecture, and computer/server hardware installation and troubleshooting. Possess strong problem-solving and communication skills, leadership abilities, and ability to prioritize and multitask. Seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can utilize my skills and expertise to make a positive impact.

experience.title: Data Center Technician
highlights: Used Linux commands to check host health, update firmware, perform OS install, flash motherboards, and check logs.
Helped set up new center with networking equipment.
Created SOPs for newly standardized procedures.
Installed equipment, developed documentation on innovative solutions, participated in site-level project work, and resolve complex problems within the data center space.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
highlights: Collaborate with clients to gather project ideas and document requirements
Offer proactive and innovative solutions to challenges.
Design and deploy custom websites using CMS platforms for small businesses and individuals
Create responsive web designs.
Plan projects, meet objectives, develop contingency plans, and create schedules
Possess knowledge of front-end architecture for applications

experience.title: Contractor/ IT Technician
highlights: Designed and deployed custom websites using CMS platforms for small businesses.
Deployed compliance software (azure), set up user profiles and SSO, and transferred corporate emails and domains from google to outlook for small businesses.
Communicated directly with clients, provided solutions, and developed SOPs for current and future work.
Troubleshooted a myriad of technical issues for clients, and provided solutions based on each client's personal needs.

experience.title: Data Center Technician
highlights: Troubleshooted AWS servers using host information, Linux commands, and physical maintenance
Utilized ticketing system to retrieve host information and diagnose problems with host hardware and software
Conducted in-depth hardware and network diagnostics on highly secure and confidential client servers.
Used AWS Linux commands to update firmware, reset network connections for intranet use, and update data about the server in the database
Installed equipment, developed documentation on innovative solutions, participated in site-level project work, and resolved complex problems within the data center space

experience.title: Geek Squad Agent
highlights: Provided technical support and troubleshooting for various consumer electronics such as computers, mobile devices, and home theater systems.
Diagnosed and repaired hardware and software issues, performed installations and upgrades, and educated customers on how to use their technology effectively.
Provided excellent customer service and maintained a high level of professionalism at all times.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A portfolio website that showcases my skills and experience. Built with react, and pulls all dynamically from my node backend.
highlights: Used HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to create a responsive website.
Used JavaScript to create a contact form that sends an email to my email address.

projects.title: Uniken
projects.description: As a key member of the Uniken team, I was responsible for a range of technical and administrative tasks to ensure the smooth running of the company's website and IT infrastructure. Using designs created by our designer, I built webpages using HTML, CSS, PHP, and WordPress, ensuring that they were optimized for performance, security, and user experience.I was also responsible for maintaining databases, creating and deleting tables, and archiving current materials in Hubspot, ensuring that our data was up-to-date and well-organized. Additionally, I set up and maintained all routing and DNS for the website, ensuring that it was always accessible to our clients and customers. Working closely with the marketing team, I helped to develop and execute new materials for promotions, ensuring that our messaging was consistent, compelling, and effective. As the overall IT administrator, I was responsible for doing a little bit of everything, from troubleshooting technical issues to managing software licenses and IT equipment.Throughout my time at Uniken, I demonstrated a strong commitment to excellence, collaboration, and customer service, working closely with my colleagues to ensure that our website and IT infrastructure were always performing at their best.
highlights: Used HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to create a responsive website.
Used JavaScript to create a contact form that sends an email to my email address.

projects.title: Sams Blog
projects.description: For Sam's blog, the client had requested the development of a website that would enable them to post information about themselves, publish poems and blog posts. Furthermore, the client desired the website to have a space-themed design. To fulfill their requirements, I developed a customized theme using WordPress and deployed the website successfully.Subsequently, I continued to work on upgrading and adding features to the website for a year post its initial launch. The website caters to an account that writes on various topics such as travel, space, finance, and technology.
highlights: Used HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to create a responsive website.
Used JavaScript to create a contact form that sends an email to my email address.

projects.title: Sentinel Home Services
projects.description: As a contracted web designer for Sentinel Home Services, I was tasked with revamping their outdated website. Their range of services included repairs, installations, and various housework tasks. Drawing inspiration from the client's military background, I utilized WordPress to create a visually-striking website with an army-style design. I improved the website's navigation, allowing potential customers to easily access information about all of their services. The end result was a transformed website that went from drab to fab, which led to immediate results: a 30% increase in sales and a 50% increase in traffic retention.
highlights: Used HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to create a responsive website.
Used JavaScript to create a contact form that sends an email to my email address.

projects.title: Closet Pioneers
projects.description: For Closet Pioneers, I undertook the task of redesigning the theme and layout of their website. The previous website was outdated and poorly developed, which led to a lack of customer engagement and ultimately required the owner to reconsider their strategy. I worked closely with the client for a period of six months, testing ideas, layouts, and themes until we arrived at a satisfactory solution.Upon completion of the website redesign, the client observed a significant improvement in user retention, with a 25% increase, as well as a 15% increase in orders placed. Additionally, I took charge of running Facebook ad campaigns for the client for three months. During this time, I custom designed and deployed three different ads, which resulted in a total exposure to over 50,000 people, and the acquisition of 100 new referral orders.
highlights: Used HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to create a responsive website.
Used JavaScript to create a contact form that sends an email to my email address.
